name: access
description: Require valid user before showing site.

name: access_log
description: number of days too keep in the access_log table.

name: access_page
description: show this page if not logged in and access=user

name: access_template
description: use this template if not logged in and access=user - not needed if access_page is set.

name: admin_color
description: the color of the admin menu

name: admin_secure
description: Require SSL connection for admin access

name: auth365_admin
description: comma separated list of users that are admins

name: authhost
description: authenticate and replicate this user profile

name: authldap_admin
description: comma separated list of usernames in LDAP that are given admin access

name: authldap_checkmemberof
description: Require memberof value when using LDAP to authenticate

name: authldap_network
description: only use ldap if the network starts with this value.  setting this and auth 365 will allow you to use ldap on the local network and office365 when remote.

name: authldaps
description: authenticate using this SECURE LDAP server

name: aws_accesskey
description: Amazon Web Services access key used in the Amazon Extra

name: aws_bucket
description: Amazon Web Services S3 bucket default

name: aws_folder
description: Amazon Web Services S3 folder default

name: aws_secretkey
description: Amazon Web Services secret key used in the Amazon Extra

name: backup_cmd
description: run this command when going to backup

name: backup_command
description: command to backup database - defaults to mysqldump

name: codereview
description: setting this to 1 will require a code reviewer to also verify any synchronize changes before they are submitted

name: convert
description: allows you to convert images on upload.   bmp-jpg,heic-jpg,tiff-jpg,jpeg-jpg,jpg-jpg

name: convert_command
description: Command to use if convert is set

name: cronlog_max
description: number of days to keep cronlog records - default is 365 days

name: database_sessions
description: if set to 1 WaSQL will use the _sessions table for session management

name: databases
description: comma separated list of database containers to show in the SQL Prompt

name: file_process
description: PHP function call to when a file is uploaded. Name and afile are sent to function

name: log_queries
description: log queries run from the Database SQL Prompt

name: login_title
description: title to display on login form

name: maintenance_datetime
description: Maintenance datetime to start, stop maintenance window  starttime|stoptime

name: memory_limit
description: overrides the default memory limit set at 500M

name: minify_css
description: use minified versions of css files when avail.  Looks for .min.css

name: minify_js
description: use minified versions of js files when avail.  Looks for .min.js

name: missing_msg
description: Message to show if page is missing. If value is a url it will redirect.

name: missing_page
description: Page to view if current page is missing (use instead of missing_msg and missing_template)

name: missing_template
description: template to use on missing pages

name: mobile_index
description: if set and client is a mobile device, use this as the homepage

name: mobile_template
description: if set and client is a mobile device, use this template

name: page_tracking
description: Enable updating the _amem, _aip, _auser, _adate, and _env in the _pages table - speed

name: passthru
description: set to 1 to allow pages to capture / page parts

name: reencode
description: allows you to auto re-encode files as they are uploaded. e.g.  wav-mp3,midi-mp3,mp3-mp3

name: reencode_command
description: Command to use if reencode has a value

name: resize
description: allows you to auto resize images on upload  e.g. 800x600

name: resize_command
description: Command to use if resize has a value

name: session_domain
description: set to root domain name to make subdomains and domians share sessions

name: smtp
description: SMTP host to user for sendmail

name: smtppass
description: SMTP password to user for sendmail

name: smtpport
description: SMTP port to user for sendmail

name: smtpuser
description: SMTP user to user for sendmail

name: stage
description: Set this site as a staging site. Setting to 1 makes isDBStage() return true

name: template_tracking
description: Enable updating the _apage in the _templates table - speed

name: user_tracking
description: Enable updating the _aip, _auser, _adate in the _users table - speed

name: userlog
description: set to 1 to log auth requests to your database. Logs to user.log in the logs directory

name: valid_hosts
description: list of valid hosts to allow - comma, space, or semi-colon separated. All others will be rejected with a 403 Unauthorized host error.

name: valid_uhosts
description: list of valid unique hosts to allow - comma, space, or semi-colon separated. All others will be rejected with a 403 Unauthorized host error.

name: wasql_crons
description: WaSQL crons allow you to schedule and manage externals processes - when and how often they run. It also records the results of such processes.

name: wasql_queries_days
description: Number of days to keep logged queries

name: wasql_queries_time
description: minimum number of seconds a query must take before logging. Setting it to 0 logs all queries

name: wasql_queries_user
description: Only log queries for this username

name: wasql_synchronize_tables
description: Additional tables to syncronize - comma separated
